local_intent: Detect, align, and execute a side grasp on the white_carton using goal_pose, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: white_carton is within reachable workspace and detectable
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT grasp segment: DetectObject -> ApproachAndAlign -> OpenGripper -> ComputeGraspPose(side->goal_pose) -> GraspAtPose(side) -> CloseGripper -> IsGraspStable.
